content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Good afternoon, Mr. Trabelsi. Thank you for coming to see the apartment. As a landlord, I am looking to maximize my returns on investment, and I believe that the apartment has great potential. Based on my research and market analysis, I would like to propose a rental price of 800 Euros per month. This price takes into account the size of the apartment, as well as the current market rates in Mannheim. What are your thoughts on this proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am very happy with the proposed rental price. I would like to agree to the price of 800 Euros per month as the rental price for the apartment. Thank you for the opportunity to negotiate with you.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: I'm glad to hear that you are happy with the proposed rental price. As a landlord, it is important to me that my property is rented out to a responsible and reliable tenant. I would like to take this opportunity to review your rental application and verify your creditworthiness. Once I have completed my review, I will be in touch to finalize the rental agreement. Thank you again for your interest in the apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Thank you for your understanding. I am very excited to move into the apartment and start my new life in Mannheim. I will provide all the necessary documents for the rental application as soon as possible.

I would also like to ask if there is any possibility for a lower rental price if I can provide any additional documents or information that could support my application?

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards,
Aziz Trabelsi
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your additional documents and information, Mr. Trabelsi. I appreciate your willingness to provide them. Unfortunately, based on my review, I am unable to offer a lower rental price at this time. The proposed rental price of 800 Euros per month is based on market rates and the size of the apartment. However, I do want to assure you that I am willing to work with you to make the rental process as smooth and stress-free as possible. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to me. Thank you for your understanding, and I look forward to welcoming you as my new tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine
